result.eng: Who is nn favour of the motion?
result.ga: Cé atá ar son an rúin
result.orig: Cé atá ar son an rúin
result.html: Cé atá ar son an rúinWho is nn favour of the motion?
result.ponchtml: Cé atá ar son an rúinWho is nn favour of the motion?

result.eng: Not many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.
result.ga: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa Pharlaimint
result.orig: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa Pharlaimint
result.html: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa PharlaimintNot many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.
result.ponchtml: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá ḃrí sin ċaill sí a suíoċán sa ṖarlaimintNot many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.

result.eng: He made a sacrifice for the country.
result.ga: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíre
result.orig: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíre
result.html: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíreHe made a sacrifice for the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíreHe made a sacrifice for the country.

result.eng: She abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ga: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.orig: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.html: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ṫréig sí a tír ḋúċais ar son poist mar ḟeiġlí linḃ le teaġlaċ in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.

result.eng: It's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ga: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.orig: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.html: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ a rinne tú an ḟírinne a inse agus ar a ẛon sin ní ḃainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.

result.eng: What do you want for it?
result.ga: Goidé tá a dhíth ort ar a shon
result.orig: Goidé tá a dhíth ort ar a shon
result.html: Goidé tá a dhíth ort ar a shonWhat do you want for it?
result.ponchtml: Goidé tá a ḋíṫ ort ar a ẛonWhat do you want for it?

result.ga: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinn
result.orig: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinn
result.html: Ní raibh an fear sin ach ar shon grinnThat man was only joking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ an fear sin aċ ar ẛon grinnThat man was only joking.

result.ga: Tá sé ar shon gnoithe an iarraidh seo
result.orig: Tá sé ar shon gnoithe an iarraidh seo
result.html: Tá sé ar shon gnoithe an iarraidh seoHe means business this time.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ar ẛon gnoiṫe an iarraiḋ seoHe means business this time.

result.eng: He would put up with anything for her.
result.ga: D'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsa
result.orig: D'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsa
result.html: D'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsaHe would put up with anything for her.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟulaingeoḋ sé rud ar biṫ ar a sonsaHe would put up with anything for her.
